verses.name: 2 Kings 19:23
verses.text: By thy messengers thou hast reproached the Lord, and hast said, With the multitude of my chariots I am come up to the height of the mountains, to the sides of Lebanon, and will cut down the tall cedar trees thereof, and the choice fir trees thereof: and I will enter into the lodgings of his borders, and into the forest of his Carmel.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:24
verses.text: I have digged and drunk strange waters, and with the sole of my feet have I dried up all the rivers of besieged places.
